TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LinkConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

Docs.summary: Provides a type converter for objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkConverter> class to convert links of one type to another type, and to access standard values and subordinate properties. Access this class through <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.

Docs.summary: Converts the specified object to another type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The most common conversion is from one <xref:System.String> to another <xref:System.String>. The default implementation calls <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> on the object if the object is valid and if the `destinationType` is <xref:System.String>.

Docs.exception: The object cannot be converted to the destination type.
